duties_responsibilities.duty: Create strategic staffing approaches to attract a wide pool of qualified talent for the organization.
Manage multiple job postings in different locations.
Review a high volume of resumes on a daily basis.
Complete multiple phone interviews and occasional in-person interviews.
Coordinate and schedule the interview process.
Gather interview feedback and relay that information to hiring managers.
Post jobs on multiple different hiring sites.
Create exciting and useful recruiting tactics to attract top-performing employees.
Collaborate with hiring managers to understand hiring needs.
Travel approximately 10% of the time to meet with candidates or hiring managers.
Manage Gearhead Career’s social media presence.
Perform administrative duties such as scheduling interviews, drafting interview questions, following up on candidate inquiries, attending job fairs, and creating job descriptions as needed.

education_certification.credential: B.A. Degree or comparable experience base
